name: Expand Explore Expatiate
description: Expand Explore Expatiate (EXP3) is my second Ludum Dare game, made with GameMaker 8.0 and sfxr. It's a simple top-down exploration game, using the arrow keys for movement. Red things allow you to take control of larger objects, while purple things kick you down another size. Get to the goal in the upper left corner to win!
